nodes.text: This man was among the sizable construction crew of the Galactic Empire's incomplete Tarkin superweapon in 3 ABY, following the Battle of Hoth. A group of Rebel saboteurs, including Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, and the Wookiee Chewbacca, jumped this man and a fellow worker, Brunok, while on the planet Hockaleg and stole their construction uniforms, enabling them to sneak aboard and eventually destroy the Tarkin.
